verses.verse: Then came<WH7126> the daughters<WH1323> of Zelophehad,<WH6765> the son<WH1121> of Hepher,<WH2660> the son<WH1121> of Gilead,<WH1568> the son<WH1121> of Machir,<WH4353> the son<WH1121> of Manasseh,<WH4519> of the families<WH4940> of Manasseh<WH4519> the son<WH1121> of Joseph:<WH3130> and these<WH428> are the names<WH8034> of his daughters;<WH1323> Mahlah,<WH4244> Noah,<WH5270> and Hoglah,<WH2295> and Milcah,<WH4435> and Tirzah.<WH8656>

And they stood<WH5975> before<WH6440> Moses,<WH4872> and before<WH6440> Eleazar<WH499> the priest,<WH3548> and before<WH6440> the princes<WH5387> and all<WH3605> the congregation,<WH5712> by the door<WH6607> of the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation,<WH4150> saying,<WH559>

Our father<WH1> died<WH4191> in the wilderness,<WH4057> and he was not in the company<WH5712> of them that gathered<WH3259> themselves together against<WH5921> the LORD<WH3068> in the company<WH5712> of Korah;<WH7141> but died<WH4191> in his own sin,<WH2399> and had<WH1961> no<WH3808> sons.<WH1121>

Why<WH4100> should the name<WH8034> of our father<WH1> be done<WH1639> away<WH1639> from among<WH8432> his family,<WH4940> because<WH3588> he has no<WH369> son?<WH1121> Give<WH5414> to us therefore a possession<WH272> among<WH8432> the brothers<WH251> of our father.<WH1>
And Moses<WH4872> brought<WH7126> their cause<WH4941> before<WH6440> the LORD.<WH3068>
And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

The daughters<WH1323> of Zelophehad<WH6765> speak<WH1696> right:<WH3651> you shall surely give<WH5414> them a possession<WH272> of an inheritance<WH5159> among<WH8432> their father's<WH1> brothers;<WH251> and you shall cause the inheritance<WH5159> of their father<WH1> to pass<WH5674> to them.

And you shall speak<WH1696> to the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> saying,<WH559> If<WH3588> a man<WH376> die,<WH4191> and have no<WH369> son,<WH1121> then you shall cause his inheritance<WH5159> to pass<WH5674> to his daughter.<WH1323>
And if<WH518> he have no<WH369> daughter,<WH1323> then you shall give<WH5414> his inheritance<WH5159> to his brothers.<WH251>
And if<WH518> he have no<WH369> brothers,<WH251> then you shall give<WH5414> his inheritance<WH5159> to his father's<WH1> brothers.<WH251>

And if<WH518> his father<WH1> have no<WH369> brothers,<WH251> then you shall give<WH5414> his inheritance<WH5159> to his kinsman<WH7607> that is next<WH7138> to him of his family,<WH4940> and he shall possess<WH3423> it: and it shall be to the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> a statute<WH2708> of judgment,<WH4941> as the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> Get<WH5927> you up into<WH413> this<WH2088> mount<WH2022> Abarim,<WH5682> and see<WH7200> the land<WH776> which<WH834> I have given<WH5414> to the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>
And when you have seen<WH7200> it, you also<WH1571> shall be gathered<WH622> to your people,<WH5971> as Aaron<WH175> your brother<WH251> was gathered.<WH622>

For you rebelled<WH4784> against my commandment<WH6310> in the desert<WH4057> of Zin,<WH6790> in the strife<WH4808> of the congregation,<WH5712> to sanctify<WH6942> me at the water<WH4325> before their eyes:<WH5869> that is the water<WH4325> of Meribah<WH4809> in Kadesh<WH6946> in the wilderness<WH4057> of Zin.<WH6790>
And Moses<WH4872> spoke<WH1696> to the LORD,<WH3068> saying,<WH559>
Let the LORD,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of the spirits<WH7307> of all<WH3605> flesh,<WH1320> set<WH6485> a man<WH376> over<WH5921> the congregation,<WH5712>

Which<WH834> may go<WH3318> out before<WH6440> them, and which<WH834> may go<WH935> in before<WH6440> them, and which<WH834> may lead<WH3318> them out, and which<WH834> may bring<WH935> them in; that the congregation<WH5712> of the LORD<WH3068> be not as sheep<WH6629> which<WH834> have no<WH369> shepherd.<WH7462>

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> Take<WH3947> you Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun,<WH5126> a man<WH376> in whom<WH834> is the spirit,<WH7307> and lay<WH5564> your hand<WH3027> on him;
And set<WH5975> him before<WH6440> Eleazar<WH499> the priest,<WH3548> and before<WH6440> all<WH3605> the congregation;<WH5712> and give him a charge<WH6680> in their sight.<WH5869>
And you shall put<WH5414> some of your honor<WH1935> on him, that all<WH3605> the congregation<WH5712> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> may be obedient.<WH8085>

And he shall stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> Eleazar<WH499> the priest,<WH3548> who shall ask<WH7592> counsel for him after the judgment<WH4941> of Urim<WH224> before<WH6440> the LORD:<WH3068> at<WH5921> his word<WH6310> shall they go<WH3318> out, and at<WH5921> his word<WH6310> they shall come<WH935> in, both he, and all<WH3605> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> with him, even all<WH3605> the congregation.<WH5712>

And Moses<WH4872> did<WH6213> as the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> him: and he took<WH3947> Joshua,<WH3091> and set<WH5975> him before<WH6440> Eleazar<WH499> the priest,<WH3548> and before<WH6440> all<WH3605> the congregation:<WH5712>
And he laid<WH5564> his hands<WH3027> on him, and gave him a charge,<WH6680> as the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH1696> by the hand<WH3027> of Moses.<WH4872>
